DOC.brief_summary: Intravitreal Bevacizumab effective treatment diffuse diabetic macular edema
DOC.brief_title: Use Intravitreal Bevacizumab Patients With Diffuse Diabetic Macular Edema
DOC.detailed_description: A non-randomized prospective clinical interventional study include 45 non previously treat patient DME . The patient receive single intravitreal injection 2.5 mg bevacizumab . Follow-up include clinical examination ( best correct visual acuity ( BCVA , intraocular pressure ( IOP ) , cataract grading , DME characteristic systemic check-up ) pre-injection , first visit , week 1 2 month 1 3 . OCT fluorescein angiography evaluated month 1 3 .
